channel.title: DSA Parent Kit Blog
channel.description: Latest digital parenting articles and resources from DSA Parent Kit.

item.title: Screen Time Management: Finding the Right Balance
item.description: Practical tips to help you set healthy boundaries and encourage balanced digital habits for your family.
item.author: Dr. Funmilayo Adeyemi

item.title: Teaching Digital Citizenship to Your Children
item.description: Help your children become responsible digital citizens with these essential lessons about online behavior and ethics.
item.author: Mrs. Chidinma Okafor

item.title: Setting Up Effective Parental Controls
item.description: A comprehensive guide to configuring parental controls across different devices and platforms to keep your children safe online.
item.author: Mrs. Ifeoma Nwosu

item.title: Best Educational Apps for Different Age Groups
item.description: Curated recommendations for educational apps that can enhance your child's learning while maintaining safety standards.
item.author: Dr. Kemi Olatunji

item.title: Recognizing and Preventing Cyberbullying
item.description: Learn the warning signs of cyberbullying and how to support your child if they become a target or witness to online harassment.
item.author: Mr. Tolu Adebayo

item.title: Starting Digital Safety Conversations with Your Family
item.description: Tips for initiating meaningful discussions about online safety that engage your children and build trust.
item.author: Mr. Emeka Uzo

item.title: The Complete Social Media Safety Guide for Parents
item.description: Comprehensive guide for parents to help children navigate social media safely and responsibly.
item.author: DSA Editorial Team
